column1: Yury Vasilyevich Malyshev (Russian: ????? ??????????? ????????) was born in the village Nikolayevsk, Stalingrad Oblast (Volgograd Oblast), USSR on August 27, 1941.
He studied in Taganrog's high school N24, 1949-1959.
He was married with two children.
He was selected as a cosmonaut on May 7, 1967.
He died on November 8, 1999 in Zvyozdny Gorodok, Moscow Oblast, Russian Federation.
He was Commander of Soyuz T-2 (June 59, 1980) and Soyuz T-11 (April 311, 1984).
